thread.title: Takeaways from Saturday's Virginia basketball scrimmage

author: wreid@dailyprogress.com(Whitey Reid)
title: Takeaways from Saturday's Virginia basketball scrimmage
text:
Whitey Reid is the Daily Progress' basketball, soccer, and lacrosse reporter. Contact him at (434) 978-7250, wreid@dailyprogress.com, or on Twitter @WhiteysWorld365.​ Takeaways from Saturday's Virginia basketball scrimmage MELODY ROBBINS Isaiah Wilkins 
Virginia's Isaiah Wilkins goes up for a dunk during the Virginia Blue-White scrimmage on Saturday at John Paul Jones Arena. Special to The Daily Progress/Melody Robbins Takeaways from Saturday's Virginia basketball scrimmage By Whitey Reid The Daily Progress Posted on Oct 24, 2015 by Whitey Reid How hot is Virginia hoops right now? So hot that on a perfect autumn day, several thousand fans poured inside John Paul Jones Arena to watch an intra-squad scrimmage.
